list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a wild carnivorous mammal of the dog family, living and hunting in packs. It is native to both Eurasia and North America, but has been widely exterminated.
used figuratively to refer to a rapacious, ferocious, or voracious person or thing.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he calls the media ravening wolves
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh ta gọi những con sói bị tàn phá truyền thông

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a harsh or out-of-tune effect produced when playing particular notes or intervals on a musical instrument, caused either by the instrument's construction or by divergence from equal temperament.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh sói xuống bữa sáng của mình
